name: eicosanoyl-CoA:methylmalonyl-CoA C-acyltransferase (mycocerosate-forming)
definition: Eicosanoyl-CoA + 4 Methylmalonyl-CoA + 8 NADPH + 8 H+ + Acyl-carrier protein <=> C32-Mycocerosyl-[acp] + 5 CoA + 4 CO2 + 8 NADP+ + 4 H2O
comment: Acy-carrier protein is acp domain of the enzyme itself [KO:K11628].
